channel.title: Hugo Creative Theme
channel.description: Recent content on Hugo Creative Theme

item.title: about
item.description: # Definition of iPavlov project def iPavlov(talent, ideas): research = ideas * talent AI = development(research) return AI # How you are related to the iPavlov project email.send('merge@ipavlov.ai', YOU.CV) if YOU in ['researcher','developer'] \ and YOU is ('ai_geek' & 'performer' & 'team_player'): iPavlov(YOU.talent, YOU.ideas) # Ready for the challenge? Send CV to merge@ipavlov.ai “Может ли машина мыслить?”: 433-460.“), Turing, Alan M. Computing machinery and intelligence. Mind 59.236 (1950): 433-460.

item.title: start_page
item.description: # Definition of iPavlov project def iPavlov(talent, ideas): research = ideas * talent AI = development(research) return AI # How you are related to the iPavlov project email.send('merge@ipavlov.ai', YOU.CV) if YOU in ['researcher','developer'] \ and YOU is ('ai_geek' & 'performer' & 'team_player'): iPavlov(YOU.talent, YOU.ideas) # Ready for the challenge? Send CV to merge@ipavlov.ai “Может ли машина мыслить?”: 433-460.“), Turing, Alan M. Computing machinery and intelligence. Mind 59.236 (1950): 433-460.
